meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of madreporians.
meanings.sent1: The madreporian coral reef was a beautiful sight to see.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the madreporian characteristics of the sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The madreporian pattern on the seashell made it look like a tiny maze.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as intricate and delicate as a madreporian design.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the madreporian landscape in her painting.

meanings.definition: A type of coral that has a hard, calcareous skeleton with many pores.
meanings.sent1: The divers marveled at the vibrant colors of the madreporian coral.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed a variety of madreporian species.
meanings.sent3: The madreporian coral seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the fish.
meanings.sent4: The shipwreck was surrounded by madreporian structures, like a ghostly city.
meanings.sent5: The underwater world was alive with madreporian formations, like a bustling metropolis.
